basic_info.description: My name is Stephen Martinez.  Before my journey here at Codefellows, I was in the security industry.  Most recently I worked for a school district where I was a safety and security officer as well as a high school baseball and wrestling coach.  I was injured on the job and it got me thinking of what I could do while I was at home healing.  A family member told me I should look into what he does, which is software development.  I was very interested and when he showed me what he does and what he creates, I was hooked.  Ideally, I'd like to work in an environment where I'm helping people with my new skills I'm learning.  I think my drive to help the people around me and my work ethic will set me in the right direction in my goals to becoming a successful Developer.

projects.title: Gallery of Horns
projects.description: Application displays multiple fantasy and actual animals with horns.  With this site the user is given a viuall appealing view of all animals, but can change the view of animals based on the number of horns.  User can also click on any of the displayed images to open another window with a larger size of that image as well as the display.  Finally, user can choose their favorite beast utilizing the provided button and will display how many times that photo has been favorited

projects.title: JASY Destinations
projects.description: Team project while attending Code Fellows.  Team JASY created a functional destinations website which allows the user to complete a questionnaire about their ideal vacation.  Based on their answers, the page will display a destination with activities and photos.  The site will also save previous displayed destinations
